examples.example: 我把重要的文件都整理好放在了对应的文件夹中，以便随时查找和使用。

translate.english: I have sorted out all the important documents and put them in the corresponding folders for easy searching and using at any time.

examples.example: 我把各种资料分类放进不同的文件夹，让工作变得更加有序和高效。

translate.english: I classify various materials into different folders to make the work more orderly and efficient.

examples.example: 我将自己的照片分类整理放入不同的文件夹，留下美好的回忆。

translate.english: I classified and organized my own photos and put them into different folders to keep the beautiful memories.
